hl.seg: The house in bone fascine still after 100 years. Throw an eye in the interiors of Gaudi.

p.seg: The roof resembles on the back of a prehistoric saurian, the staircase with a spinal column of dinosaur and the balconies with open fish mouths.
Thus is the house Casa Battlo in Barcelona of the architect Antoni Gaudi.
Because of its organic forms, the house received on behalf of the buildings the nickname of House in bone.

Organic forms, colors wild, use unusual of stones, fragments of squares and mosaîque, frontage pointing out of the scales and everywhere present curves, here all that is ypic for the Art nouveau of Antoni Gaudi.
The frontal frontage of the house unrolls its lines of dream, its pleasant colors and textures which point out nature and the animals.
During a more detailed observation one sees the geometry, the rhythm and the order thought with precision.
In the night the frontage of the house becomes even more dramatic and is lit in such way that the impression of brightness of the colors is reinforced with it.
The rolling up and the torsion of the forms also appear in the interiors with same measurement.
Wood copies in waves the windowframes, the balustrades, the decorative elements of the doors, the eyepiece and the strips.

The Battlo house which is drawn up in the Eixample district in the commercial street Passeig of Gracia to the number. 43, was born from the construction of a house of 1877 of the architect Emilio Sala the Cortes.
The rebuilding was done during two years and the house finished in 1906.

The investor, Joseph Battlo, a rich entrepreneur, insisted initially on the demolition of the old construction and the construction of another any news but quickly accepted the idea of Gaudi of the unusual rebuilding and cheaper.
But the idea of Put Battlo as an apartment building was not thought by Gaudi alone.
The architect Josep Maria Jujol worked with him.
It is precisely on its project that were born decorations for an apartment from representation of the owner of the building and the use of mosaîque for the frontage.
For the frontage also worked of other artists and creators.
Common work for the plans of the house Casa Battlo begin with a co-operation with success between Jujol and Gaudi.
Jujol took part in the construction of the house of Gaudi Casa Mila and the Guell park in which there are other works of Gaudi.
The buildings called the hot house just after its completion because of its organic forms "the House in bone."
Others, in view of specific mechanism of opening of the windows called it "the house which bucket."
It is said that at the top of construction there is a sword similar to that of Saint Georges the owner of Catalonia.
Other elements of sculpture of construction contain hidden religious reasons.
Gaudi thought for the house a single system in its central warming-up time, with vents of ventilation and typical chimneys.
Their slope of 45 degrees seems odd.
During Gaudi creation absolutely did not respect the directives of construction of then and did not let itself block by them.

At the beginning of construction it obtained on behalf of the city the building permit, knowing, of course that the data related to the plans of rebuilding were so vague that two years afterwards during the completion the town council was horrified and asked for modifications.
It did not like, for example, with the members of the town council which the pillars of construction empiettent on the public pavement.
There was never modification, but, on the contrary, only 15 days after the call of the city Josep Battlo asked for (and satisfaction obtained) the authorization of rent the two higher stages.
The owner moved on the lower floors.
In the gallery on the second floor there was a living room common and to the third a room and a private part of the apartment.
The ground floor was rented with a jewelry.
The whole house of six floors is divided by a staircase by which one reaches to an independent terrace of roof.
All the right angles and the straight lines were cancelled by the basic elements of the rebuilding and their replacement by curved walls.
Gaudi also worked the modern concept of connection of spaces.
The common part can be connected completely by opening the doors of the living rooms and the high society can communicate comfortably or to limit the space deprived for more intimate talks.
The house with the rebuilding of Gaudi received in addition to new frontages a nontraditional roof and two stages moreover.
The play of Gaudi with the light is also impressive, of the blue and white glazed tiles with which is decorated the interior court and with the wells of lights.
The play with two colors gives a maximum of light in all the floors of the house.
It was simply enough to bet on the principle that the white reflête more than sinks it which on the contrary absorbs the rays of the sun.
The house Put Battlo which was registered in 2005 in the Funds of the World heritage of UNESCO perhaps visited by each one.
On the first floor of the house is the most roomy apartment and most splendid accessible to the public.
The owners decided to take this step in 2002 at the time of the 150ème birthday of the birth of the famous creator.
They continued the visits because they noted that it is about a lucrative company and they widened the field of the visits to common spaces and the attic including the terraces of roof.
The ticket of entry in the monument is really not expensive and costs 16.50 euros\; the students, the pensioners, the groups and the holders of touristic maps have 20 percent of reduction.
The sum is nevertheless above entrance fee in other constructions of Gaudi in the city.
If you want to feel the real atmosphere of the house with its fantastic turrets, you must quickly find a comrade among the inhabitants of the building and visit the house completely.

hl.seg: How to choose a mattress and a diagrid: the women have other criteria that the men.

p.seg: No the ostentatious framework, but rather surface quality reserved for sleeping, therefore the mattress and the diagrid give a real base for a good bed.
Must of course be complementary harmoniously to like them a concrete user.
During the choice several things are determining: the weight, size, the age, the health status as well as the sex of the owner.
The type of interior in which one will place the mattress and the diagrid is also important.
A typical example?
For example in the country house where one does not sleep continuously the latex mattresses are not suitable because they "are heated" gently.
They have, in addition, a weight higher than the standard polyurethane mattresses.
It is necessary to frequently turn over them.
If they also do not have enough ventilating ducts in the middle and if they remain, moreover, on a solid board, they retain moisture. Mould can be also formed there.
The practice is also determining in the choice.
That which passes the light of time abroad when one frequently uses very thick mattresses with a softening layer, will feel of course with difficulty a low and hard surface.
"Thus all the hokeyists who return from NHL feel sorry for that they cannot sleep over there."
"For their tired shoulders, the feet and the coasts, they needed mattress with a softening layer of lazy foam."

"Such mattresses are also recommended for the people who suffer from diabetes which has a disorder of the nervous system which thus badly assumes "information" of the articulations and the skin," explains Sylva Adamczikova which specializes in the stuffed pieces of furniture.
Therefore there is a few years the mattress with lazy foam conquered the hokeyists as well as other customers.
"Today everything works well, Tempur, Italian Magnifex but also Czech Tropico have for example suitable mattresses.
You do not need to be a guy of NHL to be able to appreciate a lazy foam.
This "miracle" functions simply.
It optimizes its rigidity and its form according to absorptive heat or adapts to the heat of your body.
Nothing puts pressure on you and you will not be turned over in the night as after a difficult match.
You sleep simply better.
Lazy foam also functions like a protection against the esquarres.
For the choice of the mattress according to your size, add the length of the feet, that is to say approximately 21/34 cm.
A man and a woman of a size of 180cm thus need a bed of 210/220 cm.

Helena Prokopova, President of the Association of the Harness-maker-mattress makers and decorators who has devoted themselves for several years to the problems of a healthy sleep and the ergonomics of furniture and the sign in the specialized schools.

It is about a special connection of the strips which makes it possible to put pressure to even incline the strip so that the shoulder of the sleeper "is integrated" well.

hl.seg: A microbe tolerating arsenic raises the possibility of new types of lives on Earth, or elsewhere.

p.seg: The discovery of a strange bacterium, which can use arsenic like one of its nutritive elements, widens the field to find new forms of life on Earth and perhaps beyond.
Although the researchers discovered the unusual bacterium here on Earth, they say that shows that the life has possibilities beyond the major elements which were regarded as essential.
"This organization has a double capacity."
"It can developed either with phosphorus, or with arsenic."

"This is why it is very particular, even if it is far from being "a foreign" form of life really, Paul Davies C.W commented on. University of State of Arizona, joint author of the report appearing in the online edition of Thursday of the Science newspaper.
Six major elements were regarded a long time as essential for the life: carbon, hydrogen, nitrogen, oxygen, phosphorus and sulfur.
But the researchers discovered that the bacterium, discovered in the lake Mono, in California, is able to continue to develop after having replaced phosphorus by arsenic.
"One wonders what is still possible," declared Ariel Anbar D. of the University of State of Arizona, joint author of the report.
The discovery is important as regards research of the life beyond the Earth because the researchers must be able to recognize the life, of knowing it with what the life resembles, says Anbar.
The study concentrates on a microbe found on Earth.

However, the announcement of a press conference to discuss it, which did not reveal the details of the lucky find, generated speculations spread on the Internet according to which the report could reveal the discovery of an extraterrestrial life.
That was not the case.

The discovery "shows that, in other planetary environments, the organizations could be able to use other elements to actuate biochemistry and that "the standard" whole of the elements, that we judge absolutely necessary for the life, could not be fixed," commented on Charles Cockell, professor at the planetary scientific Research institute and spacial, Open University, Milton Keynes, the United Kingdom.
Cockell was not part of the research team.
"This work is new because it shows the substitution of an element to another in fundamental biochemistry and biochemical structure," Cockell added.
It was not a fortuitous discovery.
Felisa Wolfe-Simon of the Institute of Astrology of NASA, which directed the study, chose the lake Mono because it is equipped with arsenic elevated levels.
Arsenic and phosphorus are chemically similar\; thus, she speculated that a microbe exposed to the two substances could be able to substitute one for the other.
"Arsenic is toxic mainly because its chemical behavior is really similar to that of phosphorus."
"Consequently, the organizations have difficulty distinguishing these elements separately."
"But arsenic is sufficiently different so that it does not function exactly as phosphorus\; it penetrates inside and, to some extent, gums the work of our biochemical machine," explained Anbar.
The researchers collected the bacterium known under the name of GFAJ-1 and exposed it to increasing arsenic concentrations to which it could adapt and grow.

The microbe grows better with phosphorus but the fact that it can live with arsenic in the place raises the possibility that a form of life using arsenic can occur naturally, that is to say elsewhere on Earth or another planet or the moon where arsenic is more frequent.

Jamy S. Foster, assistant professor of microbiology at the University of Florida, said that the idea, according to which arsenic could be replaced by phosphorus, was not new\; but nothing never showed that could go.
Arsenic was more frequent at the beginning of the existence of the Earth, she says\; thus, the researchers put forth the hypothesis that the first forms of life could have used it.

That suggests that there could be other ways of forming the life, not only the way in which the life on Earth was formed at the beginning," Foster declared, which was not part of the research team of Wolfe-Simon.
Research was financed by NASA, the ministry for Energy and the National institute of health.

hl.seg: A world plan to renovate lighting

p.seg: UNO proposed yesterday in Cancún a plan of restoration of domestic, commercial and industrial lighting in 100 countries in order to obtain a greenhouse gas reduction (GES) which to the third of the additional reduction that corresponds almost should be carried out to stabilize the planetary climate by 2020.

This ambitious plan is in the tread of the concrete great projects that UNO hopes to make adopt in Cancún to compensate for the absence of constraining commitments of reduction by the industrialized countries.

According to the plan deposited yesterday, if the incandescent bulbs which still monopolize from 50 to 70% of the market were replaced by bulbs fluocompactes or, better, by bulbs with light-emitting diodes (LED or "English LED"), the main part of the 1.8 billion tons (WP) GES emitted on planet to light the human ones would be avoided.
Lighting is responsible for 8% of the world emissions.
It is the equivalent of 70% of the emissions of the planetary car fleet.

In Copenhagen, last year, large transmitting countries, like the United States, China, Europe and others, of which Canada, engaged in voluntary reduction plans which should make pass the total emissions of GES of 53 WP with 49 WP.

But it will be necessary to withdraw of this assessment still 5 WP to manage to stabilize by 2020 the rise of the climate to 2 centigrade degrees in order to prevent that it does not become out of control.
In the incandescent bulbs, 95% of energy are dissipated in the form of heat and the remainder, that is to say 5%, produced light.
With bulbs fluocompactes, the energy expense is reduced of 75% and with the new bulbs with LED, one reduces this energy requirement of twice still.
The bulbs fluocompactes last on average from 6000 to 10,000 hours.

The new bulbs with LED, as those that launched the Philips manufacturer this week - this company took part besides under investigation of UNO -, have a 25,000 hours life expectancy and consume 80% less energy than an incandescent bulb, which gives an idea of the possible economy with a plan of replacement which would apply to 100 countries.
These very new bulbs can also function with rheostats besides emitting very little heat.
And they do not contain any mercury.

Several specialists have posted reserves towards bulbs fluocompactes since they contain mercury and that they should be eliminated like dangerous wastes, which is not always possible in the developing countries, except if the manufacturers set up instructions.

But, indicates the report, the main source of mercury emission on planet is not the bulb fluocompacte, but rather the thermo plants with coal, which emit much mercury to produce electricity wasted in incandescent bulbs.
In the United States only, these power stations emit 25,000 tons of mercury per year.
The report details the profits which each country thanks to this international program would make.

For example, Indonesia would thus save a billion dollar a year in purchases of electricity and eight million tons of CO2, is the equivalent of 3.5 thermo plants of which construction would cost him 2.5 billion.

hl.seg: No online games for the young Koreans last midnight

p.seg: The South Korean government will adopt a law known as "of Cinderella" who will prohibit the teenagers from playing online games after midnight by blocking their access, indicated governmental leaders.

A government bill will be submitted to the Parliament in December to require of the companies of online games to block the access to these plays after midnight, to the young ages of less than 16 years, indicated representatives of the ministries for the culture and the family.
"Much of children play these plays all the night and have then difficulties in studying at the school and to have a normal life during the day."
"We estimate that this law is necessary to ensure their health and their right to sleep," declared in AFP OJ Rin, the ministerial person in charge in charge of the government bill.
The online games will be again accessible at 6 o'clock in the morning.
The companies will be one year old to prepare with the application of the law, he specified.
The government also plans to ask the companies to limit the daily access time to these plays for the young people whose parents make the request of it, added the person in charge.
It also will place at the disposal of people who claim it freewares which make it possible to limit the time spent on Internet.
South Korea is one of the countries "connected more" and the newspapers regularly bring back news in brief related to an intensive use of Internet.
The country is also the uncontested champion of the world competitions of online games.
In November, South Korea had gained four gold medals in World Cyber Games, vis-a-vis 58 other nations.

hl.seg: Euro: the ECB forced to maintain its purchases of titles of State

p.seg: The last meeting of the Council of the governors of the European Central bank (BCE) of the year was to be the occasion to specify the methods of way out of crisis or, at least, to announce the stop of a good number of the nonconventional operations of monetary policy which must be completed at the end of the year.

Crisis of the European sovereign debt obliges, the issuing house of Frankfurt will not be able undoubtedly to be allowed to be as peremptory under penalty of worsening a situation as tended more today on the European bond markets.
The political cost would be all the more high.

Yesterday, at the time of a press conference, the Minister of Finance Frenchwoman, Christine Lagarde, thus greeted the active role played by the ECB in favor of the resolution of the crisis of the national debts in Europe.
She did not wish to say if she estimated that the central bank was to make more, by increasing for example her programme of purchase of sovereign obligations.
"I reserve my reflection with my European partners (...) ."

The day before, in Brussels, during its hearing by the commission of the Economic affairs and monetary of the European Parliament, the president of the ECB, Jean-Claude Trichet, was not shown more eloquent as for its intentions, being satisfied to indicate that the programme of purchase of titles of State on the resale market "continued" and that "we will see what we will decide" during the meeting of this Thursday.
Only certainty: the ECB will keep its unchanged directing principal rate with 1%, its low historical level since May 2009.
In the facts, the purchases of Treasury bonds by the ECB doubled last week, with nearly 1.35 billion euros.
And, according to the indiscretions of operators of market, it would have carried out new purchases of Irish and Portuguese titles, yesterday.
On the whole, the central banks of the eurosystème bought for 67 billion euros since May 2010.
Among the operators of market, anticipations of a continuation of the purchases are not any doubt (see page 29).
The economists either do not expect notable change of course.

If the lending operations to more than three months already disappeared from the arsenal from the ECB, the latter still carries out unlimited allowances of liquidities according to generous conditions and for durations being spread out one week in three months.
The economists expect today that this device is prolonged of a few months.
"I cannot think that it modifies in an important way its program."
"If not it would be to take the chance to cause new short-term tensions," Michael Schubert, economist of Commerzbank estimates.
"A progressive exit announced during the first quarter 2011 appears more probable," anticipates on its side Norbert Bräms, economist at Sal.
Oppenheim.
As regards its interventions on the market of the national debt, "the ECB should maintain a volume purchase of these obligations to animate a dull market," Norbert Bräms adds.

Taking into account the importance of the exposures of the European banks to the markets of sovereign debts of the euro zone, the issuing house does not have other choices only to maintain its presence on the market.

"It is necessary for him at all costs to replace the lack of investors on the market and to act of such kind to prevent a racing of the outputs paid by the most fragile States," an important bond manager testified yesterday.
Because if interest rates fly away, the States will be all the more constrained to reduce their debt, if not to stabilize it.
The safeguard of the euro is at this price.

p.seg: The WikiLeaks business has a double value.
On a side, it appears an apparent scandal, a scandal which appears as scandal only in front of the hypocrisy which governs the relationship between the States, the citizens and the press.
Other, it announces deep changes with the international level, and precedes a future dominated by the regression.

The rule according to which the secret files should be made up only of already known news is essential with the dynamics of the secret services, and not only in this century.

If you go in a bookstore devoted to esoteric publications, you will see that each work repeats (on Graal, the mystery of Rennes-the-Castle, the Templars or the Rosicrucian brotherhood) exactly what was already written in the former works.

And this not only because the author of occult texts does not like to make new research (nor does not know where to seek news on the non-existent one), but because those which is dedicated to the occultism believe only so that they know already, and who reconfirms what they had already learned.
It is the mechanism of the success of Dan Brown.
Idem for the secret files.
The adviser is lazy, and lazy (or of limited spirit) the chief of the secret services (if not it could be, which I know, writer with Libération), which regards as true only what it recognizes.
Information secret signal on Berlusconi whom the American embassy of Rome sent to the State Department was the same ones as those which Newsweek published the week of front.
Then why the revelations on these files did do such an amount of noise?

On a side, they say what any cultivated person knows already, namely that the embassies, at least since the end of the Second World War, and since the Heads of States can telephone or take a plane to meet with dining, lost their diplomatic function and, except some small exercises of representation, transformed themselves into centers of espionage.
Any spectator of films of investigation knows that very well, and it is only by hypocrisy that one makes pretense be unaware of it.
However, the fact of repeating it publicly violates the duty of hypocrisy, and is used to place under a bad light the American diplomacy.

In the second place, the idea that one to hack unspecified can collect the most secret secrecies of the most powerful country of the world deals a considerable blow to the prestige of the State Department.
Also the scandal does not put it as well in crisis the victims as the "torturers."
But let us come to major nature of what arrived.
Formerly, at the time of Orwell, one could conceive all to be able as a Big Brother who controlled each gesture of his subjects.

Prophecy orwellienne had completely proven since, being able to control each movement thanks to the telephone, each transaction carried out, the visited hotel, the highway borrowed and so on, the citizen became the total victim of the eye of the power.
But when one shows, as that arrives now, than even the crypts of the secrecies of the power cannot escape control one to hack, the report of control ceases being one-way and becomes circular.
The power controls each citizen, but each citizen, or at least to hack it - elected official like avenger of the citizen -, can know all the secrecies of the power.

It is true, Georg Simmel said it already, that a true secrecy is an empty secrecy (and empty secrecy could never be revealed) \; it is true, as, as any knowledge on the character of Berlusconi or Merkel is indeed an empty secrecy of secrecy, because concerning the public domain\; but to reveal, like made WikiLeaks, that the secrecies of Hillary Clinton were empty secrecies means to remove any power to him.

Which will be the consequences of this wound inflicted with a very powerful power?
It is obvious that in the future, the States will not be able to put on line any reserved information any more - that would come down publishing it on a poster stuck to the corner of the street.
But it is quite as obvious that with current technologies, it is vain to hope to be able to maintain the confidential relationships by telephone.
Nothing easier than to discover if and when a Head of State moved in the plane and contacted one of his colleagues.

I know well that, for the moment, my forecast concerns the science fiction and is thus romantic, but I am obliged to imagine government officials which moves in a discrete way in diligences with the unverifiable routes, while being carrying only by heart learned messages or, at most, by hiding the rare information written in the heel of a shoe.
